descriptionHtml:
So What this mod Does it basically makes every Arrow able to kill any enemy with one hit. I Made this mod because i played on Master mod and thought it was stupid that even though I Shot a Enemy in the Head they still had a decent amount of Health left so i Decided to make this mod which kill every Enemy in one hit. Unfortunately Enemys also have Op arrows to but its more Balanced this way i guess XD, gives you more incentive to be Sneaky. 


Quotes by Famous and not so Famous people 

Sephyff7forever: Killing with one hit has never been easier 

If you Don\'t like the mod don\'t use it.
author: Leviathan Shade
